name: Farmer boi thingy
description:
This game is somewhat unfinished (that was a big understatement.) I just wanted to be done with this project I bit of a bit more than what I could chew this time and idk here it is as buggy as ever! The chicken shop and chick full c shop aren't set up yet ill update this game in the future or probably never because I don't get around to updating my old jam itch games.

Theme: every time you leave your farm it rejuvenates to its original state (this isn't an excuse for not learning how to save the farm data) 

Music used: Animal crossing fan-made albums one & two
